name: A Steam Theme For Youtube
description: This theme was inspired by the Steam store. Currently the theme is still work in progress.
obsoletion_message: Deleting style because YouTube recently made changes to there site making the the style even more useless. Will be making a new one soon.
additional_info:
(March 01 2019)Back to square one again. Re-did broken code. 
(May 31 2017) Re-did all the code. Fix live chat text. Fix side-nav Youtuber and section text color
(May 26 2017) Added live chat support and  fix useless code v0.0.4
(May 21 2017) Clean some code v0.0.3
(May 20 2017) Added Video title and description support. Next comment  section. v0.0.2
(May 20 2017) Theme alpha release. v0.0.1
